hero.title: Australia's Premier Racing & Sports Betting Platform

advantages.title: Advantages
advantages.advantagesBeforeText: Looking for a trusted Australian bookmaker? We offer licensed wagering with competitive odds, live streaming of Sky Racing, and instant payouts. Our platform combines racing and sports betting expertise. Here's what makes us different:
items: Licensed by Northern Territory with ASX-listed public accountability
Live streaming of thoroughbred, greyhound, and harness racing nationwide
Same race multis and same game multis with multi bet tracking
Instant deposits via PayID, Apple Pay, Google Pay with no transaction fees
Competitive odds across AFL, NRL, cricket, NBA, and international sports
24/7 live chat support with Australian-based customer service team
advantages.advantagesAfterText: Join thousands of Aussie punters enjoying secure wagering and fast withdrawals. Our team led by Matthew Tripp delivers innovative features and daily promotions.

history.title: About Betr Australia
history.description1: We are an Australian-owned wagering operator listed on the ASX with offices across Darwin, Sydney, Melbourne, and the Gold Coast. Our leadership team includes industry legends Matthew Tripp and Michael Sullivan, delivering world-class betting experiences.
items: Launched with focus on Spring Racing Carnival
Added live streaming for all Australian racing
Expanded to comprehensive sports betting markets
history.description2:
We operate under a Northern Territory Gambling Licence with strict compliance standards. Our platform uses advanced security protocols to protect your data and transactions. All odds and payouts are verified independently for fairness and transparency.
We continue innovating with new features like protest payouts and boosted odds specials. Our commitment to responsible gambling remains paramount. Experience why we're becoming Australia's preferred choice for racing and sports wagering.

customHtml.title: Racing & Sports Betting Guide
customHtml.description:
Your Complete Guide to Racing and Sports Betting at Betr

We offer comprehensive coverage of Australian and international racing alongside premium sports betting markets. Our platform combines cutting-edge technology with competitive odds to deliver the ultimate punting experience. Whether you're backing thoroughbreds at Flemington or building same game multis for AFL, we provide the tools and markets you need to bet with confidence.

Thoroughbred Racing Excellence

Our thoroughbred racing coverage spans every Australian track from metropolitan venues to country meetings. We offer competitive odds across all race types including maidens, handicaps, listed races, and Group 1 features. Every race comes with comprehensive form guides, jockey and trainer statistics, track conditions, and expert analysis to inform your betting decisions.

We provide multiple betting options for thoroughbred racing to suit every punting style. Choose from win and place markets, exotic bets like quinellas and trifectas, or build sophisticated same race multis combining multiple selections across different bet types. Our flexi betting option allows you to take complex exotic bets at reduced stakes, making big payouts accessible on any budget.

  • Fixed odds betting: Lock in your price when placing your bet, ensuring you receive the odds displayed regardless of market movements before the jump.
  • Starting price (SP): Take the official starting price determined by on-course bookmakers at the advertised time, ideal for late market movers.
  • Best tote plus SP: Automatically receive the better price between the tote dividend and starting price for maximum value on every bet.
  • Best of three totes: We compare dividends across all three Australian totes and pay the highest available, giving you extra value automatically.
  • Top fluctuation: Take the highest fluctuation price recorded by on-course bookmakers during betting, perfect for backing horses with strong market support.
  • Best of the best: Our premium option compares the three totes and official top fluctuation, paying whichever delivers the highest return on your selection.

Our live streaming service broadcasts every Australian thoroughbred meeting through Sky Racing integration. Watch races unfold in real-time while monitoring your bets, with instant result confirmations and dividend updates. We also offer in-play betting via phone for selected races, allowing you to adjust your positions as the race develops.

Greyhound and Harness Racing

We provide extensive coverage of greyhound racing from tracks across Australia and New Zealand. Our markets include all standard bet types from simple win bets to complex exotic wagers. Greyhound racing offers frequent meetings throughout the day and night, providing constant betting opportunities with quick turnarounds between races.

Harness racing completes our racing trifecta with comprehensive coverage of pacers and trotters nationwide. We offer the same variety of betting options and price types available for thoroughbreds, including fixed odds, totes, and our exclusive best price guarantees. Form guides include barrier draws, sectional times, and driver statistics to support your selections.

  • Same race multis: Combine multiple selections within a single race for enhanced odds, including exotic combinations across different bet types for bigger payouts.
  • Flexi betting: Take exactas, trifectas, first fours, and quadrellas at any percentage stake from just $1, making complex bets affordable for all budgets.
  • All-up betting: Automatically reinvest winnings from one race onto your selection in the next, building substantial returns from modest initial stakes.
  • Mystery bet: Let our system randomly select horses across multiple races for a fun, low-stakes way to stay involved throughout race meetings.
Bet Type Min Max Win
Win/Place $1 $100,000
Quinella $1 $100,000
Exacta $1 $100,000
Trifecta $1 $100,000
First Four $1 $100,000
Quadrella $1 $100,000
Same Race Multi $1 $100,000
Sports Multi $1 $100,000

Australian Football League (AFL) Betting

Our AFL coverage delivers comprehensive markets for every match from pre-season to Grand Final day. We offer traditional markets like head-to-head winners and line betting, plus extensive player props, quarter betting, and same game multis. Our odds are updated in real-time based on team news, weather conditions, and market movements to ensure competitive pricing throughout.

Same game multis have revolutionized AFL betting by allowing you to combine correlated outcomes within a single match. Back your team to win while simultaneously selecting player disposals, goal scorers, and margin ranges for substantially enhanced odds. Our intuitive bet builder interface makes constructing complex same game multis simple, with odds calculated automatically as you add each selection.

  • Match winner markets: Back your team with standard head-to-head betting or take the line if you expect a blowout result for better value.
  • Total points: Bet over/under on combined match totals or individual team scores, with live updates as the game progresses and scoring rates change.
  • First goal scorer: Select which player will kick the opening goal for enhanced odds, with our protest payout protection if your selection scores second.
  • Player disposals: Take over/under lines on individual player possession counts, popular for midfielders and premium ball-winners with consistent statistics.
  • Quarter betting: Focus on specific quarters with dedicated markets for each term, ideal for targeting strong starting or finishing teams.

Rugby League (NRL) and Cricket Markets

We provide extensive NRL coverage throughout the season including State of Origin and finals series. Our markets span match winners, line betting, try scorers, and player performance props. Same game multis are available for every match, combining team results with individual player achievements for massive potential returns on successful predictions.

Cricket betting covers all formats from Test matches to Big Bash League and international limited overs cricket. We offer traditional markets like match winners and top batsman, plus specialized props for runs, wickets, and method of dismissal. In-play betting is available for most matches with constantly updated odds reflecting the current match situation and weather conditions.

  • Match betting: Simple head-to-head markets for picking the winning team with competitive odds updated based on team news and weather forecasts.
  • Line betting: Take points handicaps when backing favorites or underdogs, with lines set to balance markets and deliver value on both sides.
  • Player props: Bet on individual player performances including try scorers, total tries, tackles, and meters gained for specialized betting angles.
  • Total points: Over/under markets on combined match totals, adjusted for weather, venue, and team defensive capabilities to ensure balanced pricing.

International Sports Coverage

Our international sports coverage extends across major leagues and competitions worldwide. NBA betting features comprehensive markets for every regular season and playoff game with extensive player props and team totals. EPL and Champions League football deliver pre-match and in-play markets for Europe's biggest competitions with competitive odds on hundreds of outcomes per match.

We also cover NHL ice hockey, US college sports, international rugby union, tennis Grand Slams, golf majors, and motor racing including Formula 1 and MotoGP. Our diverse sports menu ensures there's always something to bet on regardless of the time of day or season. Futures betting is available for major tournaments and championships, allowing you to back long-term winners months in advance.

  • NBA betting: Comprehensive coverage of every game with point spreads, totals, money lines, player props, and same game multis for massive parlay potential.
  • EPL and UCL: English Premier League and Champions League markets covering match results, both teams to score, correct scores, and goal scorer specials.
  • Tennis: Set betting, game handicaps, and match winners for ATP, WTA, and all four Grand Slam tournaments with in-play betting throughout matches.
  • Golf majors: Outright tournament winners, top finishes, and head-to-head matchups for The Masters, US Open, The Open, and PGA Championship.

Multi Bet Features and Tracking

Multi betting represents one of our most popular features with advanced tracking tools to monitor all your active bets. Our multi bet tracker displays every running multi with real-time updates on which legs have won, which are still active, and your potential returns. You can access detailed information on each leg including odds, start times, and current status from a single dashboard.

We support complex multi combinations across racing and sports with competitive maximum payouts. Build multis with anywhere from two to twenty legs, mixing racing selections with sports outcomes for diverse betting strategies. Our system automatically calculates combined odds and potential returns, updating instantly as you add or remove selections before confirming your bet.

Cash out functionality is available on selected multis before all legs are determined. This feature lets you secure partial returns if early legs win but you want to hedge against remaining uncertainty. Cash out values update dynamically based on the probability of remaining legs winning, giving you flexible control over your betting positions until the final result is determined.

Promotions and Special Offers

We run daily promotions across racing and sports to enhance your betting value. Boosted odds specials increase payouts on selected markets with enhanced prices marked clearly throughout our platform. Protest payouts protect your racing bets by refunding your stake if your horse finishes second after the winner is disqualified following a successful protest or stewards inquiry.

Our loyalty program rewards regular punters with exclusive benefits including priority customer service, enhanced odds access, and invitations to special events. We also offer targeted promotions around major sporting events and racing carnivals including bonus bets, odds boosts, and money-back specials. Check our promotions page daily to ensure you never miss valuable offers tailored to your betting preferences.

Responsible gambling remains our top priority with comprehensive tools to help manage your betting activity. Set deposit limits, loss limits, and session time reminders through your account settings. We also offer voluntary self-exclusion options and links to professional gambling support services for anyone needing assistance. Our customer service team is trained to recognize problem gambling signs and provide appropriate support resources.

customHtml_2.title: Payment Methods & Account Management
customHtml_2.description:
Secure Banking and Account Features

We prioritize fast, secure transactions with multiple banking options tailored for Australian punters. Our payment infrastructure supports instant deposits and rapid withdrawals with zero transaction fees on all methods. Whether you prefer traditional bank transfers or modern digital payment solutions, we provide flexible options to manage your betting funds efficiently and securely.

Deposit Methods and Processing

Our diverse deposit options ensure you can fund your account quickly using your preferred payment method. All deposits are processed instantly, crediting your betting balance within seconds so you never miss a betting opportunity. We accept minimum deposits from just $10, making our platform accessible for casual punters and serious bettors alike with budgets of any size.

PayID has become our most popular deposit method offering instant bank transfers using just your mobile number or email address. Simply register your PayID with your bank and use it to deposit funds directly from your account without entering BSB or account numbers. Transactions complete within seconds with full security through your bank's authentication protocols.

  • PayID deposits: Instant transfers using your registered mobile number or email linked to your Australian bank account for maximum convenience and speed.
  • Bank card payments: Visa and Mastercard debit or credit cards processed instantly with secure 3D authentication for fraud protection on every transaction.
  • Apple Pay and Google Pay: Mobile wallet payments offering one-tap deposits with biometric authentication through your smartphone for quick, secure funding.
  • Direct bank transfer: Traditional bank transfers using BSB and account number for deposits, processing within minutes during business hours for reliable funding.
  • BPAY deposits: Use your unique BPAY biller code and reference number through internet banking for convenient deposits processed within 24 hours maximum.

All deposit methods are completely free with zero transaction fees charged by our platform. Your bank may apply their own fees for certain transaction types, but we never add additional charges regardless of deposit amount or frequency. This transparent approach ensures you know exactly how much will reach your betting balance with every deposit.

Withdrawal Options and Timeframes

We process withdrawals rapidly to return your winnings to your bank account as quickly as possible. Most withdrawal requests are approved within hours during business days, with funds typically reaching your account within 24 hours. Our streamlined verification procedures minimize delays while maintaining security standards required by Australian gambling regulations.

PayPal withdrawals offer the fastest processing for returning funds to your digital wallet. Once approved, PayPal withdrawals typically complete within hours, allowing immediate access to your winnings. This makes PayPal our recommended option for punters who value speed and convenience when cashing out successful bets.

  • Bank transfer withdrawals: Direct deposits to your Australian bank account processed within 24 hours of approval with no transaction fees charged.
  • PayPal withdrawals: Fastest option returning funds to your PayPal wallet within hours for immediate access to winnings and flexible spending options.
  • Minimum withdrawal: Cash out any balance over $10 with no maximum limits on withdrawal amounts for high-value winners and professional punters.
  • Turnover requirements: Deposit turnover of 100% required before withdrawal, meaning you must bet your deposited amount once before cashing out winnings.

We implement standard identity verification procedures to comply with Australian anti-money laundering regulations. First-time withdrawals require submission of identification documents including photo ID and proof of address. Our online verification system processes documents quickly, often within minutes, allowing you to complete verification and receive your first withdrawal on the same day.

Account Security and Protection

We employ bank-grade security measures to protect your account and personal information. All data transmitted between your device and our servers is encrypted using SSL protocols, the same technology used by financial institutions worldwide. Your payment information is never stored on our servers, with all transactions processed through secure payment gateways certified to industry standards.

Two-factor authentication adds an extra security layer to your account login process. Enable 2FA through your account settings to require both your password and a time-sensitive code sent to your mobile device when logging in. This prevents unauthorized access even if someone obtains your password, providing comprehensive protection for your betting balance and personal data.

  • Password protection: Strong password requirements with regular update prompts ensure your login credentials remain secure against unauthorized access attempts.
  • Session monitoring: Automatic logout after periods of inactivity protects your account if you forget to log out manually from shared or public devices.
  • Transaction alerts: Email notifications for all deposits, withdrawals, and significant account changes keep you informed of all activity in real-time.
  • Device verification: New device login prompts require email confirmation to prevent unauthorized access from unrecognized devices or locations.

Account Management Tools

Your account dashboard provides comprehensive control over all aspects of your betting activity. View detailed transaction histories showing every deposit, withdrawal, bet placement, and settlement with downloadable statements for personal records. Filter transactions by date range, type, or amount to analyze your betting patterns and track your overall profitability.

Betting history displays all your placed bets with complete details including stake, odds, selections, and outcomes. Review settled bets to assess your performance across different sports and bet types. This historical data helps refine your betting strategies by identifying profitable markets and learning from unsuccessful wagers over time.

  • Personal details management: Update contact information, communication preferences, and password security settings anytime through your secure account portal.
  • Notification preferences: Customize which alerts you receive via email, SMS, or push notifications including promotions, results, and account updates.
  • Statement downloads: Export transaction histories and betting records in CSV format for tax purposes or personal financial management and record-keeping.
  • Favorite markets: Save frequently bet markets and competitions for quick access, reducing navigation time when placing your regular bets each week.

Mobile App Features

Our mobile apps for iOS and Android deliver the complete Betr experience optimized for smartphone betting. The intuitive interface makes finding markets, placing bets, and managing your account effortless on smaller screens. Push notifications keep you updated on race results, sports scores, and promotional offers in real-time wherever you are.

Mobile-specific features enhance the betting experience beyond our desktop platform. Touch ID and Face ID biometric login provides secure single-touch access to your account without typing passwords. Quick bet options let you place simple wagers with minimal taps, perfect for betting on the go when you need to act fast on late market movements.

  • Biometric authentication: Fingerprint or facial recognition login for secure, convenient access without entering passwords on every app launch.
  • Live streaming integration: Watch Sky Racing streams directly within the app while viewing odds and placing bets without switching between applications.
  • Bet notifications: Customizable push alerts for bet settlements, race results, and promotional offers delivered instantly to your lock screen.
  • Quick multi builder: Streamlined interface for building multi bets rapidly with automatic odds calculation and maximum payout information displayed clearly.

Customer Support Services

Our Australian-based support team provides assistance through multiple channels to resolve queries quickly. Live chat offers instant connections to support agents during business hours, typically responding within minutes. Email support handles more complex queries requiring detailed investigation with responses usually delivered within 24 hours during weekdays.

Phone support provides direct voice communication for urgent matters or situations where live discussion is more efficient than text-based support. Our phone lines operate during extended business hours across Australian time zones. Support staff receive ongoing training on all platform features, betting rules, and technical troubleshooting to provide accurate, helpful assistance.

  • Live chat support: Instant messaging with support agents available during business hours for quick resolution of account queries and betting questions.
  • Email assistance: Detailed support for complex issues requiring investigation with responses typically delivered within 24 hours during business days.
  • Phone support: Direct voice communication for urgent matters with extended hours covering Australian time zones and experienced staff handling calls.
  • Help center: Comprehensive FAQ section covering common questions about accounts, betting, payments, and technical issues for immediate self-service solutions.

Responsible Gambling Tools

We provide extensive responsible gambling features to help maintain healthy betting habits. Deposit limits allow you to cap daily, weekly, or monthly deposit amounts preventing excessive funding of your betting account. Once set, limits cannot be increased instantly with cooling-off periods enforced before higher limits take effect, giving time for reconsideration.

Loss limits track your net position over selected timeframes, automatically suspending betting access if cumulative losses reach your predetermined threshold. This feature prevents chasing losses during unlucky streaks by enforcing breaks when negative variance exceeds acceptable levels. Session time reminders prompt you to evaluate your betting duration, encouraging regular breaks during extended betting sessions.

  • Deposit limits: Set daily, weekly, or monthly maximum deposit amounts with 24-hour cooling-off periods before limit increases take effect for protection.
  • Loss limits: Define maximum acceptable losses over specified periods with automatic betting suspension when thresholds are reached to prevent chasing.
  • Session reminders: Customizable time-based alerts prompting evaluation of betting duration and encouraging healthy breaks during extended betting sessions.
  • Self-exclusion: Voluntary account suspension options ranging from 24 hours to permanent closure with links to professional gambling support services.
  • Activity statements: Detailed reporting on betting activity including amounts wagered, time spent, and profit/loss figures for informed self-assessment.
  • Support resources: Direct links to Gambling Help Online, Lifeline, and other professional services offering confidential counseling and intervention programs.

Licensing and Regulatory Compliance

We operate under a Northern Territory Gambling Licence issued by the Northern Territory Racing Commission, one of Australia's established gambling regulatory authorities. This licence ensures compliance with strict standards covering player protection, fair gambling practices, financial security, and responsible gambling obligations. Regular audits verify ongoing compliance with all regulatory requirements.

As an ASX-listed company, we maintain additional transparency and accountability through public reporting requirements. Our financial statements and operational reports are publicly available, providing unprecedented visibility into our business operations compared to privately-held competitors. This public accountability ensures we maintain the highest standards of corporate governance and customer treatment.

All betting outcomes are determined by official results from recognized sporting and racing authorities. We settle bets according to published rules available in our terms and conditions, with clear processes for handling disputes or queries about bet settlements. Our customer service team can explain any settlement decisions with reference to official results and applicable betting rules.

Platform Technology and Reliability

We've developed proprietary cloud-based betting technology providing superior performance and reliability compared to third-party platforms used by many competitors. Our infrastructure scales automatically to handle traffic spikes during major events, ensuring stable performance even when betting activity surges around big races or important sporting matches.

System uptime exceeds industry standards with redundant servers and backup systems preventing service interruptions. Our technology team monitors platform performance continuously, addressing any issues immediately to minimize disruptions. Regular updates enhance features and fix bugs based on customer feedback and usage data.

Our odds compilation team works around the clock to maintain competitive pricing across all markets. Sophisticated algorithms analyze market movements, betting patterns, and external information to adjust odds dynamically. This ensures you consistently receive fair prices that reflect true probabilities while allowing us to manage risk effectively across our comprehensive betting portfolio.

Privacy and Data Protection

We handle your personal information in strict accordance with Australian Privacy Principles and requirements under the Privacy Act. Personal data collected during registration and verification is used solely for account management, regulatory compliance, and service improvement. We never sell customer data to third parties or use it for purposes beyond those disclosed in our privacy policy.

Data retention policies ensure we keep personal information only as long as required for operational needs and regulatory obligations. You maintain rights to access your personal data, request corrections, and understand how information is used through formal data access requests processed by our privacy team.

Marketing communications are opt-in with clear unsubscribe options in every promotional email. You control which communications you receive through account settings, customizing promotional offers, race updates, and sports news according to your preferences. We respect your choices and never send unwanted communications after you've opted out of specific categories.

items.title: How do I create a Betr account?
items.answer: Creating a Betr account takes just 2 minutes. Click "Sign Up" and provide your name, email, mobile number, and date of birth. Create a secure password and accept our terms and conditions. Verify your email and mobile number through the links we send. For your first withdrawal, you'll need to complete identity verification by submitting a photo ID and proof of address.

items.title: What is the minimum deposit and bet amount?
items.answer: Our minimum deposit is $10 across all payment methods including PayID, bank cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and bank transfers. The minimum bet amount is just $1, making our platform accessible for all budget levels. There are no transaction fees on deposits or withdrawals. Maximum win limits are $100,000 for racing and sports bets.

items.title: How long do withdrawals take to process?
items.answer: Withdrawal processing times depend on your chosen method. PayPal withdrawals are fastest, typically completing within hours of approval. Bank transfer withdrawals usually reach your account within 24 hours during business days. We approve most withdrawal requests within hours, though first-time withdrawals require identity verification which can add processing time.

items.title: Can I watch live racing streams?
items.answer: Yes, we provide live streaming of all Australian thoroughbred, greyhound, and harness racing through Sky Racing integration. Streams are available on both our website and mobile apps at no additional cost. Simply log into your account and select any race to watch live coverage. You must have an active account balance to access streaming services.

items.title: What are same race multis and same game multis?
items.answer: Same race multis let you combine multiple selections within a single race for enhanced odds. For example, back multiple horses across win, place, and exotic markets in one race. Same game multis work similarly for sports, allowing you to combine outcomes like match winner, player props, and totals from the same game for substantially increased potential returns on correlated predictions.

items.title: Do you offer protest payouts?
items.answer: Yes, our protest payout feature refunds your stake if your selection finishes second but is subsequently promoted to first after the winner is disqualified following a stewards protest or inquiry. This protection applies to thoroughbred, greyhound, and harness racing across win and place markets. The feature activates automatically with no action required from you.

items.title: How do I set responsible gambling limits?
items.answer: Access responsible gambling tools through your account settings. Set deposit limits (daily, weekly, or monthly), loss limits, and session time reminders. Limits take effect immediately when decreasing but have 24-hour cooling-off periods when increasing. You can also self-exclude for periods from 24 hours to permanent closure. Contact support for assistance or visit Gambling Help Online for professional support.

items.title: What sports and racing do you cover?
items.answer: We cover all Australian thoroughbred, greyhound, and harness racing plus extensive international racing. Sports coverage includes AFL, NRL, cricket, NBA, EPL, Champions League, NHL, tennis, golf, Formula 1, and more. We offer comprehensive markets for each sport including match winners, line betting, player props, and same game multis. New markets are added regularly based on customer demand.

items.title: Are there any transaction fees?
items.answer: We charge zero transaction fees on all deposits and withdrawals regardless of amount or payment method. Your bank or payment provider may charge their own fees for certain transaction types, but Betr never adds additional charges. This transparent fee structure ensures you know exactly how much reaches your betting balance with every deposit and withdrawal.

items.title: Is the Betr app available for my device?
items.answer: Our mobile apps are available for both iOS and Android devices. Download the Betr app from the App Store for iPhone and iPad or Google Play Store for Android smartphones and tablets. The apps offer full functionality including live streaming, bet tracking, biometric login, and push notifications. You can also access our full platform through mobile web browsers on any device.
